abstract: A Boolean that indicates whether the joint is active.
overview:
## Discussion

Inactive joints do not participate in the physics simulation.

One example is a joint that does not reference any [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity] with [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsBodyMode/dynamic], or when one or both the referenced entities are not active.

# isActive

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the joint is active.

## Declaration

```swift
var isActive: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Inactive joints do not participate in the physics simulation.

One example is a joint that does not reference any [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity] with [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsBodyMode/dynamic], or when one or both the referenced entities are not active.
title: isActive
